insert.if:
insert into icbc_erp_kj_icbc
id, mid_add, mid_edit, dt_add, dt_edit, dt_sub, dt_fin, status, icbc_id, gems_id, gems_fs_id, type_id, c_name, c_carno, c_carvin,
values
#{id}, #{mid_add}, #{mid_edit}, #{dt_add}, #{dt_edit}, #{dt_sub}, #{dt_fin}, #{status}, #{icbc_id}, #{gems_id}, #{gems_fs_id}, #{type_id}, #{c_name}, #{c_carno}, #{c_carvin},

insert into icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result
id, qryid, mid_add, mid_edit, dt_add, dt_edit, status, status_oldht, remark, result_1_code, result_1_msg, result_1_value, dt_sub, type_id, icbc_id, jsonAll, fk_date, fk_money
values
#{id}, #{qryid}, #{mid_add}, #{mid_edit}, #{dt_add}, #{dt_edit}, #{status}, #{status_oldht}, #{remark}, #{result_1_code}, #{result_1_msg}, #{result_1_value}, #{dt_sub}, #{type_id}, #{icbc_id}, #{jsonAll}, #{fk_date}, #{fk_money}

select.if: select * from assess_admin where fs_type=2 and icbc_erp_tag>0
select gems.*,fs.name as fsname from assess_gems gems LEFT JOIN assess_fs fs ON fs.id=gems.fsid where gems.fs_type=2
select * from assess_fs where fs_type=2 and mgicbc_tag>0
select * from icbc_erp_admin_agp
select ki.*, fs.name as gname, gems.name as pname from kjs_icbc_mq ki LEFT JOIN assess_fs fs on ki.gems_fs_id=fs.id LEFT JOIN assess_gems gems on ki.gems_id=gems.id where ki.id=#{id}
select ki.*, fs.name as gname, gems.name as pname from kjs_icbc_cardk ki LEFT JOIN assess_fs fs on ki.gems_fs_id=fs.id LEFT JOIN assess_gems gems on ki.gems_id=gems.id where ki.id=#{id}
select ki.*, fs.name as gname, gems.name as pname from kjs_icbc_kk ki LEFT JOIN assess_fs fs on ki.gems_fs_id=fs.id LEFT JOIN assess_gems gems on ki.gems_id=gems.id where ki.id=#{id}
select ki.*, fs.name as gname, gems.name as pname from assess_cars ki LEFT JOIN assess_fs fs on ki.gems_fs_id=fs.id LEFT JOIN assess_gems gems on ki.gems_id=gems.id where ki.id=#{id}
select ki.*, fs.name as gname, gems.name as pname from kj_icbc ki LEFT JOIN assess_fs fs on ki.gems_fs_id=fs.id LEFT JOIN assess_gems gems on ki.gems_id=gems.id where ki.id=#{id}
select * from assess_fs where id=#{id}
select * from assess_gems where id=#{id}
select * from icbc_erp_admin_agp where id=#{id}
select * from icbc_erp_kj_icbc where icbc_id=#{icbc_id} and type_id=#{type_id}
